REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2605 reute w f BC-SUNGARD-<SNDT>-IN-4.8 03-30 0052

TEXT.TITLE: SUNGARD <SNDT> IN 4.8 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: SunGard Data Systems INc said its Investment Systems division received a 4.8 mn dlrs software development contract from Bankers Trust Co. The contract calls for two-year development of a comprehensive employee benefit plan administration system. Reuter
